title: State v. Johnson
description: Defendant John Johnson is charged with armed robbery of First National Bank on January 15, 2025.

title: Smith v. Anderson Corp
description: Plaintiff Sarah Smith is suing Anderson Corporation for workplace discrimination and wrongful termination.

title: In re: Estate of Williams
description: Probate case regarding the distribution of assets from the estate of Robert Williams.

title: State v. Thompson
description: Defendant Emily Thompson is charged with aggravated assault that occurred on February 28, 2025.

title: Brown v. City of Metropolis
description: Plaintiff Michael Brown is suing the City of Metropolis for damages resulting from a pothole accident.
